CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . He is a GPE pensioner .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) granted his claim against ORG and recovered arrears in respect of disability and food allowances in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) and in the amount of RUB CARDINAL respectively . ORG held that as of DATE the applicant had been entitled to a certain increase in his disability allowance , and that as of DATE he had been entitled to yet another increase in disability and food allowances . ORG further held that as of DATE the applicant was entitled to a DATE disability allowance in the amount of RUB MONEY and to a DATE food allowance in the amount of RUB MONEY . Furthermore , ORG held that in future , the DATE disability and food allowances had to be increased in line with the minimum subsistence amount if its index of growth attained an inflation rate of PERCENT . The judgment acquired legal force on DATE .
CARDINAL . According to the ORG , the judgment of DATE was enforced in full . The final payment under that judgment was made in DATE .
CARDINAL . The applicant submitted that the judgment of DATE remained without enforcement in the part concerning the payment of a DATE food allowance .
